high_descs: Turn left, walk to the basketball
Pick the basketball up on the ground
Turn around, turn right, walk to the dresser with a lamp on it
anns.task_desc: Grab the basketball in the corner, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left, walk straight toward the box on the floor.
Look to the floor and pick up the basketball beside the box.
Turn around and walk toward the bed, turn left to face the small cabinet.
Turn on the lamp on the cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp on a cabinet with a basketball in hand.

high_descs: Turn to the left and find the box and basketball.
Pick up the basketball from the floor.
Take the basketball and turn around to the right and find the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on top of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turning on a lamp across the room.
